title.value: Совершенствование учета биологических активов в контексте МСФО [Международных стандартов финансовой отчетности]
Perfection of the biological actives account in context of IAS [International Accounting Standards]
Perfection of the biological actives account in context of IAS [International Accounting Standards]

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Pavlov, A.K., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: In this article the problem of enhancement of biological assets accounting in the framework of International Accounting Standards is considered. The notion
and is successfully applied to accounting practices in many countries. Thus, using IAS 2

, one can make correct estimation of the agricultural production that has been received from these assets. Authors have pinpointed and explained the necessity of the considerable improvement of biological assets accounting process and agricultural production that has been received to know if there is an opportunity to use it in Belarus, considering positive experience of introduction in practice of positions IAS 41
